      • add_days

        public static java.util.Date add_days(java.util.Date date,
                                      int days)
        This method add_days(Date date, int days) takes a java.util.Date value as its first parameter and the integer number of days as its second parameter. It then adds the number of days to the date and then returns the new date.
        Parameters:
        date - This is the first paramter to add_days method
        days - This is the second paramter to add_days method
        Returns:
        Date This returns the date after the additions of days parameter to the date parameter.

      • isValid

        public static boolean isValid(java.lang.String dateStr)
        This method checks the validity of the date String and its format.
        Parameters:
        dateStr - This is the parameter to the isValid method in isValid method. It is supposed to be a date.
        Returns:
        boolean This returns if the dateStr passed to the method is a date string in "dd-MM-YYYY" format or not

        public static boolean isInteger(java.lang.String int_str)
